title: Kate and Python Language Server
summary: The text discusses the Python Language Server (LSP) and its slow response time when used with Emacs. Some users have found alternative LSP servers, such as pyright, which they find faster and more efficient. Others have recommended the Ruff server, which is not yet ready but shows promise. Jedi Language Server is also mentioned as a fast and useful tool for refactoring and auto-completion, but may not handle linting and type checking as well. Basedpyright is another alternative LSP server that can be set up on popular editors.
